title: Afterlife Design Sheet
description: Defines what happens after death in a religion -- whether the afterlife is real or imagined, its nature, how souls are sorted, and whether the living can visit. The afterlife's reality or fiction fundamentally affects follower behavior and story tension.

religion_id.description: The religion this afterlife belongs to

afterlife_exists.description: Whether the afterlife is objectively real, merely believed in, or deliberately ambiguous

sorting_criteria.description: How souls are sorted (conduct, faith, both, divine judgment, self-selection)

can_living_visit.description: Whether and how the living can visit

relation_to_undead.description: How the afterlife concept relates to undead existence

x-cross-references.religion-profile: This afterlife belongs to a Religion Profile
x-cross-references.undead-type-profile: Undead existence may relate to afterlife concepts
